plot: Two men play Russian Roulette in hope that it saves their lives. They want to be off, to a place away from everyone else that has labeled them insane. No more loneliness. No more pain. No more medication.
title: On to Heaven
plot_es: Two men play Russian Roulette in hope that it saves their lives. They want to be off, to a place away from everyone else that has labeled them insane. No more loneliness. No more pain. No more medication.
plot_en: Two men play Russian Roulette in hope that it saves their lives. They want to be off, to a place away from everyone else that has labeled them insane. No more loneliness. No more pain. No more medication.
